fields.content:
Hi {{ shortName }},

{{ purchaser }} has bought you a license for Writerr, it has automatically been assigned to your account.

Login today to take advantage of all the premium features!

{% include 'email/salutation.txt' %}

classes.assign_nolic
fields.content:
Hi {{ shortName }},

{{ instructorName }} has assigned you to the class {{ className }}. 

We don't currently have a active license on file for you. Please login and purchase a license to access your new class.

{% include 'email/salutation.txt' %}

fields.name: classes.assign_nolic
classes.assign_noacct
fields.content:
Hi {{ shortName }},

{{ instructorName }} has assigned you to the class {{ className }}. 

We don't currently have a active account with this email address. Please create an account with this email and login to access your class. You may also need to purchase a license if your instructor did not provide you with one.

{% include 'email/salutation.txt' %}
